subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh’s Gregory Polanco tripped and fell while trying to catch an easy fly, and the ball dropped for an R.B.I. single in the 12th that sent the Chicago Cubs to an 11-10 win over the Pirates.
snippet: Pittsburgh’s Gregory Polanco tripped and fell while trying to catch an easy fly, and the ball dropped for an R.B.I. single in the 12th that sent the Chicago Cubs to an 11-10 win over the Pirates.
